abstract: Citigroup‘s global cost-cutting effort will be felt especially keenly in New York, where Citi is the largest private employer. Of the 17,000 jobs the bank said would be cut, about 1,600 will be eliminated in the city, where Citigroup has 27,000 employees and its headquarters.
